New Records: Ivory Coast made it two wins from two qualifiers, taking them closer to defending their AFCON title
Key Match Events: Oumar Diakite scored the first goal for Ivory Coast
Jean-Philippe Krasso scored the second goal for Ivory Coast
Pre-Game Insights: Chad dominated possession but struggled to break down Ivory Coast's defense
Ivory Coast had strategic control and composure in the match
Post-Match Reflections: Ivory Coast's coach praised the team's resilience and progress in qualifying for AFCON 2025
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Yaounde, Cameroon
Ivory Coast's second win in a row is a significant milestone
Others: The match was part of Group G in the 2025 AFCON qualifiers
